headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Valuation Check After Strong 2025 Results And Upgraded Analyst Views
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) has drawn fresh attention after releasing fourth quarter and full year 2025 results, updating 2026 earnings guidance, and prompting a series of analyst comments on its recent performance and outlook. See our latest analysis for PPG Industries. Against that backdrop, PPG Industries' share price has gained 10.8% over the past month and 21.8% over the past quarter, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 6% contrasts with a 5 year total shareholder return decline of 9%...

headline: PPG global leaders transform Kids in Distress campus in Florida with COLORFUL COMMUNITIES project
summary: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., February 02, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the completion of a COLORFUL COMMUNITIES® project in collaboration with Heart of America to revitalize multiple spaces at the Fort Lauderdale, Fla. campus of Kids in Distress, Inc. (KID), an organization dedicated to preventing child abuse, preserving families and treating children who have been abused and neglected.

headline: PPG introduces PPG STEELGUARD 652 coating for interior structural steel
summary: PITTSBURGH, February 02, 2026--PPG introduces PPG STEELGUARD 652 waterborne coating that offers low certified thickness and delivers up to two hours of fire protection.

headline: PPG Industries: Buy This Dividend Aristocrat At Below Average Price
summary: PPG Industries, Inc. is rated a Buy with strong BBB+ balance sheet, 53-year dividend growth streak and active buybacks. Read more on PPG stock here.
